title._content: People in school at the Malin farm labor camp

description._content: Original Collection: News and Communication Services (P 57) Item Number: P120:2605 Image Description: School for children of potato harvest workers at Malin Farm Labor camp. Course is conducted the same as in the other county schools. Teachers are Mrs. Mildred Lahoda and Mrs. Bessie Cornett, both from Malin. The one-room school is a former barracks building moved from Tulelake Relocation Center. You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more? You can find more digital resources online.
